COMMITTEE ON SCIENTIFIC AIDS TO LEARNING
James B. Conant, Chairman
Vannevar Bash
Ross G. Harrison
Frank B. Jewett
Bethuel M. Webster

Irvin Stewart, Director
COMMITTEE OF NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL
41 EAST 42ND STREET, NEW YORK, N.Y.
Telephone: Murray Hill 2-8352
Mr. Frank E. Sehooley
Radio Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Sehooley*
Please pardon this delayed expression
of my thanks for your letter of April 25 commenting upon
the specification for a school broadcast receiver, I
am relaying your comments to Mr. Hogan who will take them
into account in the revision of the specification#
James B. Conant, Chairman
Vannevar Bush
Ross G. Harrison
Frank B. Jewett
Bethuel M. Webster
Ben D. Wood
Irvin Stewart, Director
Sincerely yours.
is/sq
Irvin Stewart,
Director
